org.jetlang.core

Interface Scheduler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Fiber
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FiberStub, SchedulerImpl, ThreadFiber

    public interface Scheduler
extends Disposable
    Component that can schedule events to execute in the future. Similar to the ScheduledExecutorService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Disposable schedule(Runnable command, long delay, TimeUnit unit)
      Creates and executes a one-shot action that becomes enabled after the given delay.
      Disposable scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable command, long initialDelay, long period, TimeUnit unit)
      Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given period; that is executions will commence after initialDelay then initialDelay+period, then initialDelay + 2 * period, and so on.
      Disposable scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable command, long initialDelay, long delay, TimeUnit unit)
      Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jetlang.core.Disposable

        dispose

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        Disposable schedule(Runnable command,
                  long delay,
                  TimeUnit unit)
        Creates and executes a one-shot action that becomes enabled after the given delay.
        Parameters:
        command - the task to execute
        delay - the time from now to delay execution
        unit - the time unit of the delay parameter
        Returns:
        a Disposable that can be used to cancel execution

      • scheduleWithFixedDelay

        Disposable scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable command,
                                long initialDelay,
                                long delay,
                                TimeUnit unit)
        Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.
        Parameters:
        command - the task to execute
        initialDelay - the time to delay first execution
        delay - the delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next
        unit - the time unit of the initialDelay and delay parameters
        Returns:
        a Disposable that can be used to cancel execution

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        Disposable scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable command,
                             long initialDelay,
                             long period,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given period; that is executions will commence after initialDelay then initialDelay+period, then initialDelay + 2 * period, and so on. The task will only terminate via cancellation or termination of the executor.
        Parameters:
        command - the task to execute
        initialDelay - the time to delay first execution
        period - the delay
        unit - the time unit of the initialDelay and delay parameters
        Returns:
        a Disposable that can be used to cancel execution
